document_data.name: Shizuoka
document_data.mainbody: '''Shizuoka''' was a [[samurai]] retainer of the [[Michimori clan]] in [[Maeshi Province]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1360 DR]].
document_data.History: Shizuoka was ordered, together with his younger brother [[Shizadai]], to lead a company of [[bushi]] to assist an adventuring party hired by [[Michimori Uemon]] to retrieve the [[Seven Swords]]. He may have helped them battle [[Korimori clan]] troops led by [[Sakigahara]] and [[Himeji]].
